meanings.sent1: The mugginses believed everything they heard.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a mugginses and fall for that scam.
meanings.sent3: The group of mugginses unknowingly walked into a trap.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a mugginses when she realized she had been tricked.
meanings.sent5: The mugginses in the story always made silly mistakes.

meanings.definition: Used to refer to oneself in a self-deprecating manner.
meanings.sent1: I always forget my keys, typical mugginses!
meanings.sent2: Mugginses like me never seem to get it right.
meanings.sent3: Oops, I did it again, what a mugginses I am!
meanings.sent4: Even though I try my best, my inner mugginses shows up sometimes.
meanings.sent5: Being a mugginses, I often laugh at my own mistakes.
